attributes.action: UK government Support for Justice for Rohingya
attributes.additional_details: The Rohingya people of Myanmar (Burma) are facing intense and extreme violence on an extensive scale. A military offensive by the military in Myanmar, targeting the Rohingya Muslim minority in the country, they have have been gang-raped Tortured Burnt alive,
attributes.background: The Rohingya people are facing intense and extreme violence on an extensive scale. The UN has stated that the attacks were well organised, coordinated and systematic, ‘not only to drive out the population in droves but to prevent the fleeing Rohingya victims from returning to their homes.
